pdb18.gui.multimedia

Class Picture

  • java.lang.Object
    • pdb18.gui.multimedia.Picture

  • public class Picture
extends Object
    The picture class that represents proxy of the OrdImage of an animal in the database. It provides methods for image manipulation.
    Author:
    Tomas Aubrecht (xaubre02@stud.fit.vutbr.cz)
